code: import*as React from'react';function StaticContainer(props){return props.children;}export default React.memo(StaticContainer,function(prevProps,nextProps){var prevPropKeys=Object.keys(prevProps);var nextPropKeys=Object.keys(nextProps);if(prevPropKeys.length!==nextPropKeys.length){return false;}for(var key of prevPropKeys){if(key==='children'){continue;}if(prevProps[key]!==nextProps[key]){return false;}}return true;});
